name: Bottle o' Code
description:
The puzzle game was made for a game jam. The theme was bottleneck and the interpretation of it for this game was the optimization process where assets go through optimization to be faster in a bottleneck pattern.

Go through each level with the goal of optimizing or simplifying multiple code examples and some mathematical problems. Once you are done, drag the code examples out of the bottle to complete the level!

Total development time: <20h

*This game is meant to take some time, it's not fast pace*
